hadith.text: It was narrated from Sa'd bin Ishaq bin Ka'b bin Ujrah, from his father, that:His grandfather said: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) prayed Maghrib in the masjid of Banu 'Abdul-Ashhal, and when he finished praying some people stood up and offered Nafl prayers. The Prophet (ﷺ) said: 'You should offer this prayer in your houses
